ai-pli-tv-pvr1.7:1.1_0: having sexual intercourse with the seventh.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.7:1.2_0: and having sexual intercourse with the three kinds of mindfulness meditation:
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.7:1.3_0: We may be directly known and concerned. ...
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.7:2.1_0: If a monk, out of disrespect, defecates, urinates, or spittles, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.7:2.2_0: If a monk, out of disrespect, defecates, urinates, or spits in the water, and he has an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.7:2.3_0: There may be resolution face-to-face, acting according to what has been admitted, and covering over as if with grass.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.7:3.1_0: The seventh section for recitation is finished.
